name: Escape Inferno
description:
A fatal invitation to the underworld. After escaping from problems all your life, you, a master escapist, are tasked with a final act: To escape from the devil's contract! Interact with the denizens of the underworld. Devise the ultimate plan to escape the inescapable, once and for all.

Play time: ~5 minutes

Control:

W/A/S/D: Up/Left/Down/Right

Space: Respawn

This game is made for the 2022 GameDev.tv game jam.

Please leave a comment below! We would love to hear your thoughts on our game. Any words of encouragement or constructive criticism is greatly appreciated.
